name: vehicle-lifecycle-cli
description: Client NodeJS application to manipulate vehicle-lifecycle

scripts.transfers: npm run makeSuspiciousTransfer1 && npm run makeSuspiciousTransfer2 && npm run makeSuspiciousTransfer3 && npm run listVehicles
scripts.demo: npm run reset && npm run setup && npm run listVehicles && npm run makeSuspiciousTransfer1 && npm run makeSuspiciousTransfer2 && npm run makeSuspiciousTransfer3 && npm run listVehicles
scripts.shortDemo: npm run reset && npm run setup && npm run listVehicles && npm run makeSuspiciousTransfer1 && npm run listVehicles
scripts.deployAndRunDemo: npm run clean && npm run deployXom && npm run deployRuleapp && npm run setup && npm run listVehicles && npm run makeSuspiciousTransfer1 && npm run makeSuspiciousTransfer2 && npm run makeSuspiciousTransfer3 && npm run listVehicles

author: IBM
